overview: Every week there are several marriages on The City of Dead. The parties are amazing that last several days - always in the graveyard. They start in a morning with the ceremony that makes the mattress of the grooms and displays the trousseau. A few days later the process culminates in a raucous party (with professional musicians or DJs), often abundantly filled with alcohol, with high consumption of hashish ... and bills flying.
title: Waiting For Paradise
